title: Spirit11 - Fantasy Cricket Platform
description: A high-performance fantasy cricket platform built with Next.js 15 and FastAPI, featuring real-time gameplay, secure authentication, and an AI-powered chatbot. Includes fantasy team creation, player analytics, leaderboard systems, and admin panel for comprehensive cricket tournament management.

title: Supply Chain Management System
description: A comprehensive Supply Chain Management System developed as a group project. The system provides end-to-end supply chain visibility, inventory management, and logistics tracking. Features include real-time monitoring, supplier management, and analytics dashboard for optimizing supply chain operations.

title: Restaurant Service Web App
description: A full-stack restaurant platform featuring a dynamic menu, AI-powered chat assistant for ordering and recommendations, user authentication (customer & admin), and Stripe payment integration. Built with a React + Tailwind CSS frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB datastore, and Google Generative AI for conversational UX. Fully responsive for desktop & mobile.

title: Holiday Life - Travel Website
description: A Business to Consumer travel website developed for lushWare-Org as a group project. The platform enables users to browse and book travel packages, hotels, and activities. Features include user registration, booking management, payment integration, and responsive design for optimal user experience across all devices.

title: Nano-Processor
description: The assigned lab task is to design and develop a 4-bit nanoprocessor capable of executing 4 instructions. This includes several components that need to be developed or extended from the previous labs and this is a group project for Computer Organization and Digital Design module for semester 2. We used Vivado to all the coding and simulation works.

title: POS System
description: Required to develop a program to manage an online shopping system. The shopkeepers can login to the system and add new items and edit current items which are available in the shop. Customers can login to the system and track their current shopping cart. Backend is developed by Java and GUI is developed using JavaFX.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Framer Motion. Features a premium glassmorphism design with smooth animations and interactive elements. Showcases my skills, projects, and provides a professional way to connect with potential clients and employers.
